about_the_game:
Welcome to the Old Mines! Coming from talented and well respected artist WizardOfiD, the Old Mines booster pack provides a wide range of tunnels, props, doors and a collection of other assets, ideal for buildings your own abandoned mine, or underground bunker.

Designed with the modern day in mind, the pack is equally useful for post apocalyptic, dystopian, cyberpunk and other genres. This pack also includes special parts that connect the old mine with the lost caverns booster pack and secret bunker booster pack sold separately

With over 350 individual models, including pipes, rocks, rooms, tunnels and signs, you're sure to find what you need to create your own mine.

Designed with the modern day in mind, the pack is equally useful for post apocalyptic, dystopian, cyberpunk and other genres. This pack also includes special parts that connect the old mine with the lost caverns booster pack and secret bunker booster pack sold separately

With over 350 individual models, including pipes, rocks, rooms, tunnels and signs, you're sure to find what you need to create your own mine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
